metadata.title: RA and FSP Curriculum: I-007 Introduction to MCUboot for RA and FSP

sections.content:
This introductory curriculum course provides the basics needed to develop FSP based projects using FSP, RA and MCUboot. 
I-007 Introduction to MCUboot for RA for FSP 4.5.0- an overview presentation covers the key topics needed to understand and use MCUboot in RA developments with FSP. The lab includes step-by-step process that shows the student how to create a bootloader project using the MCUboot module and how to sign the user application project image. Image verification steps are illustrated to help implement secure upgrade capabilities.
  The course materials are available in a single zip file here.
  I-007 Introduction to MCUboot for RA for FSP 4.3.0- an overview presentation covers the key topics needed to understand and use MCUboot in RA developments with FSP. The lab includes step-by-step process that shows the student how to create a bootloader project using the MCUboot module and how to sign the user application project image. Image verification steps are illustrated to help implement secure upgrade capabilities.
  The course materials are available in a single zip file here.
  I-007 Introduction to MCUboot for RA for FSP 4.0.0
The course materials are available in a single zip file here.
  All Courses
All Introductory RA and FSP courses are listed here.
